snippet: Russell Martin delivered the go-ahead hit for the second straight day, a leadoff home run in the 11th inning Saturday that sent the Toronto Blue Jays past the Boston Red Sox.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Toronto Blue Jays defeat Boston Red Sox, 5-4; other MLB scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Russell Martin delivered the go-ahead hit for the second straight day, a leadoff home run in the 11th inning Saturday that sent the Toronto Blue Jays past the Boston Red Sox.

headline.print_headline: Blue Jays Need Extra Innings but Get 10th Straight Victory
headline.main: Blue Jays Need Extra Innings but Get 10th Straight Victory
